summary: 1991  was a common year starting on Tuesday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text:
William Tomlin  was an English cricketer who played first class cricket for Leicestershire from 1894-1899  and as a professional in the Lancashire League.
^ Cricket archive-William Tomlin Retrieved 11 October 2012
^ Tomlin's Lancashire League stats Retrieved 12 October 2012
title: William Tomlin
